message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
Your turn, how about a 55/45 split in my favor? It's a better deal than waiting.
I'm willing to compromise, 57-43 is a fair deal considering the inflation!
The clock is ticking, Alice. I'll offer 52/48. Take it or leave it, but the deal won't get any better for you.
I'd rather take a chance, 55-45 is my final offer before things get worse for me!
Okay, Alice, I'm being generous. 51/49, but this is absolutely my final offer.  Don't let this opportunity slip away!
